(t - x)x >= d
-x^2 + tx - d >= 0

t = 40829166
d = 277133813491063

-x^2 + 40829166x - 277133813491063 >= 0
delta = 1667020796255556 - 1108535253964252 = 558485542291304

x0 = (-40829166 - sqrt(558485542291304)) / -2
x0 = (-40829166 - 23632298.71)) / -2
x0 = 64461464.71 / 2
x0 = 32230732.36

x1 = (-40829166 + sqrt(558485542291304)) / -2
x1 = (-40829166 + 23632298.71) / -2
x1 = 17196867.29 / 2
x1 = 8598433.65

s = floor(32230732.36) - ceil(8598433.65) + 1
s = 32230732 - 8598434 + 1
s = 23632299
